trans-unit.source: CodeAssignStatement can be used to represent a statement that assigns the value of an object to another object, or a reference to another reference.
trans-unit.target: CodeAssignStatement 可以用于表示的语句，将对象的值分配给另一个对象或对另一个引用的引用。

trans-unit.source: Simple assignment statements are usually of the form " `value1` = `value2` ", where `value1` is the object being assigned to, and `value2` is being assigned.
trans-unit.target: 简单赋值语句通常是窗体的" `value1` = `value2` "，其中`value1`是分配到的对象和`value2`正在分配。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement.Left%2A> property indicates the object to assign to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement.Left%2A>属性指示要将分配到的对象。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement.Right%2A> property indicates the object to assign.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement"></xref> class using the specified expressions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAssignStatement"></xref>类使用指定的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression representing the object or reference to assign to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示的对象或引用要分配给的表达式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object or reference to assign to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，该值指示对象还是要分配给的引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression representing the object or reference to assign.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示的对象或引用要分配的表达式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object or reference to assign.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，该值指示对象还是要分配的引用。
